title: Added new formula functions to make it easy to extract part of an AFE's estimate in a report.
Fixed issue where About page and Dashboard wouldn't show available updates of Execute 21.
Search for a DocumentID in the browse page now works.
Multiple Enhancements to integration with WellEz, and import of field estimates.
Authorized users are now able to create Document Links between all "Primary" document types.
New functionality to allow a User to "Take Ownership" of a task if the share a User Group with the task's owner.
Wells and Sites can now be copied
Support for field mapping to copy data from Well/Site to Job, when creating a new Job.
Fixed issue where Reassign tool wouldn't show Workflow tasks correctly.
Support for Database Document Export (Qbyte and Envision) from the Integration Agent (for SaaS deployments of Execute)
